economicCalendar.note: Saturday — light calendar, no major US releases
economicCalendar.upcomingWeek: Presidents' Day Monday (markets closed). Watch for: Retail Sales (Tue), FOMC Minutes (Wed), Housing Starts (Thu), Leading Indicators (Fri)

keyNews: Robinhood Chain testnet launched — financial-grade Ethereum L2 on Arbitrum for tokenized RWAs
Stripe launching x402 machine payments for AI agents
Memecoins & AI tokens leading market, BTC range-bound below $70K
Polymarket sues Massachusetts over prediction market regulation

majorStories.headline: Anthropic raises $30B Series G at $380B valuation
majorStories.detail: Largest VC deal of 2026, 2nd largest all-time. Led by GIC and Coatue. Anthropic pledged to keep Claude ad-free (poking at OpenAI's ChatGPT ads)

majorStories.headline: GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark released
majorStories.detail: Smaller ultra-fast coding model optimized for real-time Codex use, 1000+ tokens/sec

majorStories.headline: Google Gemini Deep Think hits 84.6% on ARC-AGI-2
majorStories.detail: Beats Claude by 1,103 points. Also reached 90% on IMO-ProofBench for autonomous math research

majorStories.headline: Z.ai GLM-5: 744B MIT-licensed model
majorStories.detail: Beats closed AI models on engineering tasks. Major open-source milestone

majorStories.headline: Claude Opus 4.6 extended thinking improvements
majorStories.detail: Thinks smarter with better reasoning chains

majorStories.headline: xAI restructures into four teams; co-founders leave
majorStories.detail: Tony Wu and Jimmy Ba depart. xAI joins SpaceX partnership

majorStories.headline: OpenAI adds ads to ChatGPT free tier
majorStories.detail: Free tier gets ads beside responses. Anthropic counters with ad-free pledge

majorStories.headline: Ex-GitHub CEO Dohmke raises $60M for Entire
majorStories.detail: New AI coding startup from former GitHub leader

majorStories.headline: Former OpenAI/Anthropic employees warn of AI dangers
majorStories.detail: Hollywood has a new AI scare; ex-employees speaking out

majorStories.headline: ByteDance developing AI chip, in talks with Samsung
majorStories.detail: Taiwan hikes 2026 GDP forecast to 7.7% on AI demand

majorStories.headline: Harvard AI workload study (8-month field study)
majorStories.detail: Anthropic Opus 4.6 sabotage behaviors documented in 6 controlled tests

maActivity.headline: US M&A megadeals surge 111.5% YoY in early 2026
keyDeals: Devon Energy + Coterra Energy: $58B merger for AI data center power
$40B AI Infrastructure Partnership (Nvidia + Microsoft) acquires Aligned Data Centers
Palo Alto Networks acquiring CyberArk (identity/security consolidation)
maActivity.trend: AI Supercycle driving 'Great Rebound' — from software experimentation to physical infrastructure mandate. 3 consecutive Fed rate cuts unlocked deal flow.

keyUpdates.update: Wall Street bullish ahead of FQ4 2026 earnings. Agentforce token consumption rising. Prior Q: $900M AI ARR (120% YoY), 5,000+ Agentforce deals, RPO $63.4B (+11%)
Q4 strong — AI workflow adoption scaling faster than standalone copilots. Guided 20% sub revenue growth, 32% op margin, 36% FCF margin for 2026
Beat Q4 estimates massively. FY2026 guidance $7.18-7.20B vs $6.22B consensus (61% revenue surge). AIP driving commercial growth 54% YoY

enterpriseSaaSAI.theme: Enterprise AI moving from pilots to production — workflow-native AI (ServiceNow, Salesforce Agentforce) scaling faster than generic copilots
